title: A Timeline of Hurricane Sandy
description: From a single wave off the coast of Africa to a $52 billion sea wall 10 a decade later.
dc:creator: Winnie Hu and Patrick McGeehan

media:content.media:credit: Kirsten Luce for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Victor Concepcion, a janitor who was mandated to stay the night at P.S. 8 in Dumbo in Brooklyn, surveys the arrival of Sandy.
